summary: This document is a deposit account opening application for the Butterfly Trust with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas. It includes personal information about the trust and its trustee, as well as compliance information regarding anti-money laundering and customer identification policies.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is identified as the trustee of the Butterfly Trust, which is the account holder in this application.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is also mentioned as a trustee associated with the Butterfly Trust.

connections.description: Both Darren Indyke and Richard Kahn are trustees of the Butterfly Trust, indicating a shared responsibility for the trust's management.

keyFacts: The document is a deposit account opening application for the Butterfly Trust.
Darren Indyke and Richard Kahn are identified as trustees of the Butterfly Trust.
The application includes compliance information related to anti-money laundering and customer identification policies.
The trust is associated with an address in St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands.
The document emphasizes the legal obligations of financial institutions to verify the identities of account holders.
